name: Tshepiso Thosago
title: Information Systems Graduate
professionalSummary: Organized project manager committed to achieving operational objectives of each project by contributing to strategic plans and reviews. Hands-on experience planning, analyzing and implementing assigned projects and establishing schedules and project parameters. Solves critical issues in time-sensitive environments.

experience.title: System Admin Clerk
duties: Increased efficiency by streamlining filing systems and organizing important documents.
Enhanced office organization with regular maintenance of files, records, and supplies inventory.
Supported event planning initiatives through venue sourcing, material preparation and logistics coordination resulting in successful gatherings.
Processed mail accurately and efficiently, ensuring that all correspondence were distributed to correct recipients in time.
Utilized strong multitasking skills to manage multiple priorities and tasks, ensuring timely completion of each assignment.
Facilitated communication between eight departments through prompt forwarding of messages and coordination of inter-departmental meetings.
Trained new clerks on company procedures and software tools effectively contributing to their integration into the team.
Provided quality clerical support through data entry, document management, email correspondence, and overseeing operation of office equipment.
Provided meeting support by taking minutes and dictations.
Input data into spreadsheets and databases.
Created and maintained detailed records of all office activities.
Assisted with onboarding of new employees.

experience.title: Data Annotator

duties: Enhanced data accuracy by meticulously annotating and labeling various data types.
Followed strict quality control measures for consistently reliable results throughout diverse assignments.
Assisted in refining annotation guidelines to improve overall efficiency and accuracy within our team.
Reduced errors in machine learning models by providing high-quality annotated data.
Developed and implemented data entry operations.
Used computer software to store and retrieve data.
Scanned over 300 documents and saved in database to keep records of essential organizational information.
Updated and maintained customer information, documents and records.
Checked for accuracy by verifying data and records.
Trained new team members on annotation tools, ensuring consistency across all projects.
Contributed to development of AI algorithms through precise data annotation tasks.
Coded and processed applications into required electronic formats.
